main event: Multiple UFO sightings reported over Smyrna, Georgia, between 1952 and 1956, involving objects described as bright lights with various behaviors.
interesting points: Sighting from 1/2/56 reported an object slightly larger than a star, lasting about 60 seconds., In one report, the object was described as oval and illuminated from within, exhibiting pulsating effects., A 13-year-old witness saw a bright light moving in the sky for 10 to 15 minutes on 7/6/56., Several officials concurred that some sightings were likely caused by conventional aircraft., Reports indicate varying shapes and colors, with some objects disappearing suddenly.
sighted object: bright white light, possibly oval in shape, larger than a star
witness description: Individuals including civilians and military personnel, one was a student aged 13.
